item.title: Coding
item.description: C / C++ C Lecture - 1 Exercise 0 ~ 31 C Lecture - 2 Exercise 32 ~ 40 C Lecture - 3 Exercise 41~ 48 C Lecture - 4 Exercise 48 ~ 51 C# C# Note - 1 How to create C# console application without Visual Studio C# Note - 2 How to build a configurable scheduled task on Window Service? Java Java Note - 1: Enum Replace constant property of the interface or abstract class with Enum Java Note - 2: Concurrency Common good practice for Java Concurrency programming Java Note - 3: Path and Files Some good part of Java 7 - Path and Files API Java Note - 4: Date Time Java 8 provides a comprehensive Date-Time API to work with date, time, and datetime
